job description:
Are you a Big Data Engineer that is interested in working for one of the leading financial institutions? Do you have passion for leveraging data to find deep, meaningful insights in order to improve a customers experience or to better engage employees? If so, please read on.

This Large Multi-National company seeks a talented Big Data Engineer that will be responsible for driving the storing and processing of data and enable analytics to make operational improvements.

As the Big Data Engineer, you will:
• Translate business requirements into technical documents and design solutions
• Build out data capabilities while leveraging automation and open source technologies
• Be responsible for a data pipeline that can clean, extract and aggregate data
• Be responsible for the data mining and data modeling capabilities
• Be responsible for the risk processes and data management
What you need:
  • Bachelors degree and 3+ years in big data management
  • Experience with Azure and/or Hadoop
  • Experience with SQL and NoSQL (MongoDB, Cassandra, other) environments
  • Experience with ETL
  • Scripting or automation via python, ruby, or Java is helpful
  • Knowledge of data security with Active Directory, Kerberos, Ldap, OR oAuth, etc
What you get:
• Work with one of the leading financial firms
• Incredible work perks (too many to name!)
